mods.abstract: A collection of songs dealing with science fiction, fantasy, medievalism, sex, computers, etc.
mods.note: Four editions of the HopSFA Hymnal were published, all containing items which were claimed to infringe on copyrights. Because of this, copies were issued in redacted form, and the book went out of print. The fourth edition was a limited and numbered edition. Credits are erratic, often by just first name or last name or pseudonym, or missing completely. This reflects the state of filk at the time; frequently little attention was paid to authorship or copyright.
